Vertex/fragment/geometry shaders and shader programs.

GLSL source code type, for extra type safety.   Source Edit

Procs

proc glsl(source: string): GlslSource {...}{.inline, raises: [], tags: [].}
Shorthand for constructing GLSL source code.   Source Edit 
proc newProgram[V](window: Window; vertexSrc, fragmentSrc: GlslSource;
                  geometrySrc = glsl""): Program[V]
Creates a new shader program from the given vertex and fragment shader source code. If the geometry shader's source code is not empty, it will also be compiled and linked. This can raise a ShaderError if any of the shaders fails to compile, or the program fails to link.   Source Edit

Exports

Program, program_base, IMPL_setUniform, IMPL_use
